def upgrade():
    # ### commands auto generated by Alembic - please adjust! ###
    op.add_column(
        'users', 
        sa.Column('is_admin', sa.Boolean(), nullable=True)
    )
    op.execute("UPDATE users SET is_admin = false")
    op.alter_column('users', 'is_admin', nullable=False)
    # ### end Alembic commands ###
